title: Strictly's Kelvin and Oti's scintillating rhumba 'breaks' judges and leaves fans speechless

Kelvin Fletcher and Oti Mabuse left Strictly Come Dancing viewers - and the judges - speechless with his scintillating rhumba this evening.

The hunky Emmerdale star wowed viewers with his rolling hips during the incredibly sexy number this evening.

Head Judge Shirley Ballas was forced to fan herself and admitted that she "didn't know which bit to start with".

"A very masculine man with scintillating leg action," she gasped. "You just sent my temperature through the roof."

(Image: BBC)

(Image: BBC)

Meanwhile Bruno Tonioli said: "I've been basking like the rest of the nation... everybody has been hyperventilating!"

He added: "I've never seen hips igniting so much!"

The pair received four nines, giving them a total of 36 and were sent straight to the top of the leaderboard.

Earlier, Kelvin also left fans sweating over his see-through shirt, with jaws dropping after seeing him in his outfit tonight.

(Image: BBC)

While another commented: "KELVIN IS WEARING A SEE-THROUGH SHIRT!!! #Strictly."

A third remarked: "See-through shirt alert! And Kelvin wears it a little better than Mike... #Strictly."
